traceability.evidence: - test/cli.config-file.test.js: 7 tests related to config-file support all pass under Vitest (exit codes and output assertions) - README.md includes documentation of .dry-aged-deps.json format and --config-file flag - src/config-loader.js implements loading, JSON parsing, schema validation (keys, ranges, allowed values), error handling, and merge precedence (CLI > config > defaults) - src/cli-options.js integrates loadConfigFile and applies defaults when no config file present
traceability.notes: The implementation provides full support for .dry-aged-deps.json in the project root, validates schema and values, merges config with CLI flags (with correct precedence), handles errors with clear messages, and preserves default behavior when no config file is present. Documentation and tests cover the required functionality, satisfying all mandatory acceptance criteria. Optional JSON schema file was not added by design but deemed non-blocking.
